original_title: Buttman's British Moderately Big Tit Adventure
overview: While in the United Kingdom, Buttman convinces his hotel hostess to engage in some less than proper behavior.  He takes a trip to the museum, and while the art is educational, he's more interested in the beautiful woman who catches his eyes.  Later, he, Dario, and Joey get acquainted with some girls from northern England.
title: Buttman's British Moderately Big Tit Adventure
